Attacks.Name: Thunderous Kick
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Galarian Zapdos gains power equal to the damage dealt. Wild: The target gains the Stagger special condition.

Attacks.Name: Brave Bird
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Galarian Zapdos suffers 1 damage and may Push the target character away S.

Attacks.Name: Close Combat
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, Galarian Zapdos may reroll up to two dice in its attack roll. After this attack is resolved, Galarian Zapdos suffers 1 damage.

Superpowers.Name: Defiant
Superpowers.Effect: If Galarian Zapdos has a special condition, it gains 1 additional die to its attack rolls.

Superpowers.Name: Sky Leap
Superpowers.Effect: Place Galarian Zapdos within Range 2 of its current location. After being placed, enemy characters within Range 2 gain the Slow special condition.

Attacks.Name: High Impact Strike
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Galarian Zapdos may throw the target character if it is Size 3 or less.

Superpowers.Name: Battle Frenzy
Superpowers.Effect: Remove 2 damage from Galarian Zapdos. After using this superpower, Galarian Zapdos gains the Stagger special condition.
